message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product at a special price of $15000. This is a great opportunity to get a high-value item at a competitive rate. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. However, $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for the product. Let me know what you think!

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. While I appreciate your interest, $9000 is below our minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to lower the price to $14000, which still offers great value for the product. Let me know if this works for you!
Hi Bob, I understand that $14000 might still be a stretch. How about we meet in the middle at $13000? This is a fair price and a great deal for the product. Let me know your thoughts!
Hi Alice, thanks for coming down on the price. However, $13000 is still a bit high for me. I can go up to $9500. What do you say?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but $9500 is still below our minimum. I can go as low as $12500, which is very close to my bottom line. This is a final offer from my side. Let me know if you can meet this price!

Hi Bob, I understand we're trying to find a middle ground. My final offer is $12500. This is the lowest I can go while still valuing the product appropriately. Please let me know if you can accept this price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $12500 is still above my budget. I can stretch to $10000, which is my final offer. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Bob, thank you for your final offer. Unfortunately, $10000 is still below our minimum acceptable price. I will have to sell the product to another buyer who is willing to meet our price. It was great negotiating with you, and I hope we can do business in the future.
